                                   int offset)
        Adds a Selectable that performs an En Passant move on the Game
        Parameters:
        tile - to be rendered at and the tile to move to
        offset - used to find the piece to be removed

      • addCastleSelectable

        public void addCastleSelectable(Tile tile,
                                boolean forWhite,
                                boolean kingSide)
        Adds a Selectable that performs a Castling chess move on the game to a given tile upon clicked
        Parameters:
        tile - to move to
        forWhite, - the Color side castle is performed on top-bottom
        kingSide, - the Piece side castle is performed on left-right

      • inCheck

        public boolean inCheck(Piece king,
                       int row,
                       int col)
        Refer to Board::inCheck implementation of this algorithm for details
        Parameters:
        king, - the king to check for and perform evaluations on
        row, - the row of the position
        col, - the column of the position
        Returns:
        whether or not the position is in Check
